titleStmt.title: Open Arabic Periodical Editions: Bibliography of periodicals

respStmt.resp: Main author and editor of this file
Transcribed the lists of periodicals from the 4th volume of dī Ṭarrāzī
Data cleaning, added information from dī Ṭarrāzī, Ziriklī and Sarkīs
Contributed data based on their own research, which has been imported from Project Jarāʾid
Contributed data directly from AUB library catalogues
Contributed MARC XML through an API
Contributed MARC XML through an API
Conversion of library data from MARC XML to TEI, data cleaning, and reconciliation

revisionDesc.change: Created this file through automated conversion from file:/Users/Shared/BachUni/BachBibliothek/GitHub/OpenArabicPE/authority-files/data/tei/bibliography_OpenArabicPE-periodicals.TEIP5.xml
